name: Medieval Village Pack
description:
The Pack contains a total of 32 Prefabs, all in their respective folders, The Props are :

  • Wind-Mill
  • Wooden Houses
  • Well
  • Weapons - Swords, Axe, Crossbow
  • Walls
  • Fences
  • Gates
  • Lamps

And Much More.

The Inside of the houses or the Windmill are Empty, so you can customize them .

5 PBR Textures with Albedo, Normal, Roughness Maps.

All textures are 1024x1024.

Vertices Count : 1019082

Triangles Count : 2019921
